main event: A truck driver observed a long, cigar-shaped object that changed color and direction over Belle Glade, Florida.
interesting points: The object was the size of a basketball and emitted a dull orange to glaring white light as it changed direction., The object produced a broad roar to a high-pitched whine when it turned., When spotlighted, the object went into a steep climb and disappeared., The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes., The object appeared triangular when turned vertical.
witness description: truck driver and one other person
